Class ClientTask

java.lang.Object
  zeta.Task
      zeta.ClientTask
public abstract class ClientTask
extends Task

The client side task interface for the ZetaGrid framework.

getVersion

public abstract java.lang.String getVersion()
Returns the version of the task. The version should not contains more than 4 characters.

Returns:
the version of the task.

setResources

public abstract void setResources(java.lang.String resources)
Sets the available resources for this task.

Parameters:
resources - the available resources for this task.

setEnableStandardOutput

public abstract void setEnableStandardOutput(boolean enableStandardOutput)
Enables the standard output stream for the computation.

Parameters:
enableStandardOutput - true to enable the standard output stream for the computation.

start

public abstract int start(WorkUnit workUnit,
                          int cpuUsage)
Starts the computation of the specified work unit. The computation should not consume more than the specified CPU usage.

Parameters:
workUnit - the work unit to compute
cpuUsage - available CPU for this computation
Returns:
0 if and only if the computation was successfully completed.

stop

public abstract int stop()
Can also be called from another thread or process to stop the computation.

Returns:
in milliseconds how long the client should before it terminate all processes
